basics.name: Panagiotis Gonidakis
basics.label: Post-doc researcher at CmPA, KULeuven
basics.summary: I'm a post-doc researcher at CmPA, KULeuven. My research interests are machine learning, computer vision, space weather, solar physics, medical imaging

work.name: CmPA, KULeuven
work.summary: I am applying machine learning in space weather applications, such as solar flare forecasting and solar coronal structure segmentation and detection.

education.area: Deep Learning for medical imaging applications
Deep Learning for medical imaging applications

projects.name: Automatics in Space Exploration (ASAP)
projects.summary: The ASAP project is dedicated to advancing the automation of space mission operations by harnessing the power of artificial intelligence. By developing AI-driven algorithms optimized for onboard processors, ASAP aims to enhance the autonomy, efficiency, and adaptability of future space missions. This initiative represents a critical step toward reducing human intervention in mission operations, allowing spacecraft to make intelligent decisions in real-time, even in deep-space environments.
